attributes.additional_details: Two new Secondary Schools in Hackney are Supposed to Be Built between 2017-2020. These are The City Of London Academy - Shoreditch and The City Of London - Downs Park. The Downspark School aint a problem. However, in order for the New School in Hackney to be built, Whitmore Primary School will have to be Demolished which Requires ALL Whitmore Students To Be Re-Located during there Prepetition to A Successful Carrer, and Making all teachers Jobless. We need As much Help To Save Whitmore School!
attributes.background: Whitmore Primary School is a Mixed Community Primary School situated in the North Of Hackney. 'This is an Outstanding School' OFSTED - 1-2 May 2013. Also with achieving 'Outstanding' in Quality of Teaching, Behaviour & Safety & Leadership & Management and 'Good' for Achievement of pupils!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
